item.title: The Hasso Plattner Institute is offering a free six-week MOOC on the Internet
item.description:
The Hasso Plattner Institute (HPI) is offering a free, six-week online course in English about the fundamentals of the Internet. Starting on March 31st, HPI’s director, Professor Christoph Meinel, will teach participants about the technical basis of the Internet through a massive open online course (MOOC) titled “Introduction to Internetworking with TCP/IP.” The course is available to anyone and can be accessed through free registration. Professor Meinel believes that anyone who uses the Internet for daily tasks like online shopping, reading news articles, or sending emails should understand the technologies that make these actions possible...

item.title: Asian students are focusing on hospitality management programs at LHE
item.description:
Asian students make up a significant portion of the student population at the four hospitality schools operated by Laureate Hospitality Education (LHE): Glion Institute of Higher Education, Les Roches International School of Hotel Management, Kendall College, and Blue Mountains International Hotel Management School. Source: LHE. From left, Hou, Tatar, Williams Knight. Judy Hou, CEO of Glion Institute of Higher Education, noted a growing demand for LHE’s programs (offered in Switzerland, the US, and their branch campuses) throughout the region...

item.title: BCM Institute offers Business Continuity Management courses specifically designed for small and medium-sized enterprises in Singapore
item.description:
The BCM Institute, in collaboration with the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC), is offering a free two-day Business Continuity Management (BCM) course designed to enhance the resilience of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) against disruptions. Taking place on October 28-29, 2014, at the Singapore Productivity Centre, this course is presented with support from the Singapore Business Federation and SPRING Singapore. Participants will engage with the following topics: APEC-endorsed step-by-step BCM implementation guidelines Complimentary, ready-to-use BCM templates Guidance on utilizing BCM templates Insights into BCM trends affecting SMEs, shared by an APEC ASEAN BCM Working Group Committee member SMEs meeting the criteria of an annual sales turnover not exceeding S$100 million or employing 200 or fewer staff are eligible to participate...
